channel.title: How do I add full phrases? – Politepix

item.title: How do I add full phrases?
item.dc:creator: Serkes
item.description:
For example,
If I add the phrase “Uncle Will” to the dictionary then this causes the dictionary to register the word’s “Uncle” and “Will” as their own words.

My question is, how can I make it so the words “Uncle” and “Will” are only recognized when they are together in the proper order (“Uncle Will”)?

item.title: Reply To: How do I add full phrases?

item.description:
